sentences.sContent: The imperialists use this ideology and culture as a lever for easily realizing their domination and subjugation, aggression and plunder of other countries.
sentences.sContent_eng: The imperialists use this ideology and culture as a lever for easily realizing their domination and subjugation, aggression and plunder of other countries.
sentences.sCn: 帝国主义者使用这种思想和文化作为一种杠杆，轻易地实现其统治、征服、侵略以及掠夺他国的目的。

words.tran: 显性的；占优势的；支配的，统治的
占主导地位的；强势的；占统治地位的；[数] 受控的
控制，支配；处于支配地位（dominate的过去式）
控制；支配；占优势；在…中占主要地位
